content:
Oh, hello!
You know, I'm not very tall at all, especially for russians. And that's why I wanna be tall, big and awesome x)
One of my favourite games is Heroes of Might and Magic, I've been playing it since my childhood, sooooo... like in a song about pineapplepen...
I have a game. I have some skill... Ooooh, cosplay!
There are some photos from different russian events, however there is no good photoshoot now, sorry~

P.S.: Now I can be more than 2 meters high! Yeeeeeeeeeeeeaaaah!
P.P.S.: I'll also be very glad to get some help with tags and correct names! <3
Harpy cn: KrisKuz
